derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from the verb roust

entry.tran: (尤指在码头或油井工作的)普通工，非技术工，非熟练工
entry.def: A roustabout is a unskilled worker, especially one who works in a port or at an oil well.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a ship's crew who performs manual labor
